data.title: Arrington de Dionyso's Malaikat dan Singa
data.meta_description:
Suara Naga by Arrington de Dionyso's Malaikat dan Singa, released 22 January 2020

1. Kerasukan
2. Baru Limunan
3. Aku di Penjara
4. Bianglala
5. Bianglala Batin (instrumental)
6. Iblis Atas Iblis
7. Madu Mahadasyat
8. Susu Naga
9. Wadah Rohani
10. Perawan Berawan
11. Halilintar (original version)

Originally released as K Records KLP 226 in 2011. 
"Suara Naga" is Indonesian for "The Voice of the Dragon" and this classic album was the second of the "Malaikat dan Singa" albums, which lead to helping me make many connections in Indonesia, with many invitations to organize tours and other performances and collaborations with local musicians. 

Arrington de Dionyso's 2011 album Suara Naga [KLP226] is a pleasant balm for any creative spirit.

By "pleasant", I mean incendiary.
By "balm", I mean Cro-Magnon regressive.
By "any", I mean freaks only.
By creative", I mean dangerous.
And by "spirit" I mean the flames of Hell and the flowers of Eden entwined upon the nuptial sofas of pleasure.
By "spirit", I mean wearing grooves in the floor boards of your dirty mind.
By"spirit", I mean that part of you that either heeds the call or gets destroyed.
By"spirit", I mean this force coursing through your corporeal privates.
By "spirit", I mean a mystical draft.
By "spirit", I mean fermented juice.
By "spirit", I mean a sharpened stick rammed through an animal.
By "spirit", I mean you really don't need any more music, this one alone will do.
By "spirit", I mean a catalyst for your art.
By "spirit", I mean, SPIRIT!
Now get out there and play this album at full volume while doing something good.

The Facts:

This is the second Arrington de Dionyso's Malaikat dan Singa album, the first is entitled simply Malaikat dan Singa [KLP215] and was released in 2009.
"Malaikat dan Singa" means "Angels and Lions", "Suara Naga" means "The Dragon's Voice".
All of the lyrics on both records are in Indonesian, which Arrington taught himself specifically for this project.
The album was recorded at Dub Narcotic Studio in Olympia, with an all-star cast including members of LAKE and Angelo Spencer et les Hauts Sommets. The record was produced by Karl "The Genius" Blau.
You know how in the 1950s the press and parents and such talked about how rock'n'roll had some evil, sexual, tribal force that was going to possess the youth? Arrington de Dionyso's Malaikat dan Singa is really that. Trance-punk dancehall explosion gonna knock you up! 2011! 
Press

"With a name like Arrington de Dionyso, you can only expect something extremely exotic, and the man always knows how to dish it up." â€“ Tiny Mix Tapes

"You could call it chaos, but (Arrington de Dionyso) seems to know exactly what's going on at all times." - The Washington Post
data.text:
KERASUKAN (Possessed by Spirits) tabrakan dari visi dan suara mengalir itu dari muara melebur kiri kanan saya pasang surut (flux and flow) saya menghutani dari mulut saya membuaya dari sulur kebinalan bianglala batin kemuluran dari dewa kelamin suaraku tiba di tenggorok saya membulan dari merokok membuat semesta khayalan pembakaran dari persepsi kerasukan rasi tenaga tak terbatas buta ke totalitas bunga mengalir engkau tak terbatas dari akar aku, saya mengawan Aku mabuk dari madu dewa jiwa tulang dan jiwa arwah Tulang dari tulangku kerangka dari kepala Kerakusan aku kerasukan Terbuat binatang yang membuat binasa merasakan aku! aku yang mengalir kenikmatan- Penciptaan terbuat segala nafas kehidupan gelombang nafas kehidupan berdebar nafas kehidupan manis nafas kehidupan bergetar getaran kehidupan manis kemanisan kehidupan segala hal ini maksud sudah diberikan. ENGLISHHHHHHHH (The tree of life turned upside down) Voice and Vision in collision flowing out of the mouth of the river fusing left and right I flux and flow I create forests through my mouth Make crocodiles from vines Disobedience is the inner rainbow- stretching out the sex god- Elongation of the sound- My voice comes through the throat I make the moon from smoke and a universe of imagination a combustion of perception constellations in possession unlimited power blind to the totality eternal energy you are without limit, eternal energy From the root of me, I climb into the sky I was drunk from god-honey bone and soul Bone of my bones Crown of the skull of the head I am possessed with appetite Made of animals that destroy Feel me! I am pleasure-flowing Creation is made complete, By cresting waves of the breath of life, pounding waves of the breath of life, sweet breath of life, vibrating breath of life, vibration sweet life all the sweetness of life This intention has been given- by white fire on black fire on white fire we chew the meat through darkness of night.

BIANGLALA (Rainbow of Fire) berombak gelombang cahaya perubahan perempuan. Engkau malaikat? Teriak terik pembakaran suaraku suaraku tenggorokku teriak terik terang teramat otot dan urat dan tulang teramat terik, terang benderang seribu juta miliar pecahan matahari percikannya cahaya pecahannya cahaya mengejawantahkan diri sebagai dewa di tulang dilahap oleh api bianglala yang membersih sucikan. aku dikonsumsi oleh api, api api api bianglala Di dunia yang fana dari bayang kurasakan cinta Siapa rasakan cinta? Nada tambahan merupakan kecintaan terang. Suaraku pembakaran segera selama lamanya. rasul dari bisikan rasi. Berdasarkan baru limunan... purbakala ke segera Vibrating waves pulsating bright emanation of intuition- You are an angel? I shout with a blazing flame- my voice my throat on fire Roaring resonance the blazing lights muscles and tendons and bones extremely hot, bright- a thousand million billion floating suns- sparks of light- subtle light fractions- manifest themselves as gods in the bone- devoured by the fire that cleans, a purifying rainbow.of fire. I was consumed by fire, fire fire fire rainbow- In the dark fleeting world of shadows I feel the love Who feels the love? Overtones making love with the light- Cosmic voices blaze eternal- Messengers from the whisperings of constellations- Foundation firm in the Invisible New- From antiquity to the immediate to the eternal- I am a rainbow on fire.
